summary: AN ORDINANCE accepting electrical underground distribution easements over portions of Shorewood Addition \#1; Government Lot 1, Section 2, Township 26 North, Range 3 East; northeast quarter of Section 17, Township 23 North, Range 4 East; First Addition to Lake Forest Park; Seelye Addition; Angel City Division \#2; southeast quarter of Section 1, Township 23 North, Range 3 East; southeast quarter of Section 18, Township 26 North, Range 4 East; and the southeast quarter of Section 5, Township 26 North, Range 4 East.
